text: (ai rasool) jab tumhaare paas eemaanadaar auraten tumase is baat par baiyat karane aaen ki vah na kisee ko khuda ka shareek banaengee aur na choree karengee aur na jena karengee aur na apanee aulaad ko maar daalengee aur na apane haath paanv ke saamane koee bohataan (ladake ka shauhar par) gadh ke laengee, aur na kisee nek kaam mein tumhaaree naafaramaanee karengee to tum unase baiyat le lo aur khuda se unake magafirat kee dua maango beshak bada khuda bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
